short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Helping users find bargains on Funda.nl

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A tool to make the analysis of real estate on Funda.nl easier.

The tool collects the visible details of the property listings and:
- adds additional details to each listing calculated from the details on the page
- adds additional details to each listing calculated from an external API (when available)
- allows users to download the listing details to Excel

The tool only works on search results pages for Funda.nl
